topics.body: Is it me. Or are people from the colder and harsher northern climates or desert climates such as the Middle East and Central Asia generally more intelligent than their tropical and resource rich southern counterparts? I don't mean to be prejudiced or racist. But I've noticed that some of the most accomplished minds in this world, powerful people, and powerful wealthy nations are based north of the equator.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534b1e08636872051a030000#post_534b1e08636872051a030000
The northern hemisphere have 90% of the total population and twice as much emerged land (and this is counting the inhabitable Antarctica for the south). It only need 10% of the intellectual to be considered proportionally represented.
topics.author: 509129db7f123b36cb010fa5

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534b38576368721c456b0200#post_534b38576368721c456b0200

He was naming it as the exception to the "White European Power oppresses not-white, not-European power". Japan - a yellow nation - Empired over Korea and China, yellow nations wealthier in resources.

And let's not forget Vietnam... Philippines briefly... And they fought with Russia over some stuff they wanted, until the US intervened and kindly told them to stop.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
Speaking of russia: They want to annex the moon. . . not even joking either.

Russia's prime minister when talking about their space plans for a moonbase said that he is looking at laying claim to a part of the moon.


Hate to break it to everybody, but the idea of lunar colonies for the sake of having a lunar colony is a financial black hole.  The reason why nasa and that is looking at lunar colonies is to potentially mine helium-3; so yeah why russia wants the moon is kind of stupid.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
